__e: Comrade Lieutenant, get all crew on board immediately.
Comrade Lieutenant, Please, if anything, tell my mother that I was reported missing.
I brought the field kitchen, Comrade General.
That's how I see it, comrade General.
I don't know who managed to get out, Comrade General.
Captain, what do I do now?
Comrade Captain ... We have a delegation from the team.

Perhaps we're holding you a bit, comrade police officer, but as we have such a rare chance, and some young men may be considering the police as their future occupation, could you tell us some stories from your professional life?
Comrade Colonel, Please turn around, I do not go so much backward,
